title: Desi Lydic Checks In with Her Uncle Lou | Dahlia Lithwick & Patrisse Cullors
itunes:title: Desi Lydic Checks In with Her Uncle Lou | Dahlia Lithwick & Patrisse Cullors
description:
Desi Lydic calls her "uncle" Lou Dobbs, Dahlia Lithwick discusses Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and Patrisse Cullors talks Black Lives Matter and "When They Call You a Terrorist."
